title: Fields of Desolation
text:
This ﬁeld in the [[Talenta Plains]], not far from the [[Karrnath]] border, is the smallest known [[manifest zone]] linked to [[Shavarath]]. It is no more than a hundred yards square, but
this area has seen enormous bloodshed throughout the
history of [[Khorvaire]]. Mundane geography might play a
part in the site’s importance, since the rolling hills around
it tend to channel armies through the ﬁelds, but its ties to
Shavarath are almost certainly more signiﬁcant.
